>
[Settlement Scholastics](/Feats.aspx?ID=6248) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 184 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Archaeologist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=237)

**Prerequisites**
[Archaeologist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6246)

</column>

---

Your studies open up new horizons. Choose a specific settlement. You gain the [Additional Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=5114) skill feat in the [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) skill for that settlement and learn a single common or uncommon language of your choice that's prevalent in that settlement.

**Special** You can take this feat multiple times. When you take this feat again, choose a different settlement.
name: Settlement Scholastics
